means: electronic radiation source eliminator 电子辐射源消除器

sentence.Network_en: She tried to erase the memory of that evening.
sentence.Network_cn: 她试图忘却那天晚上的事。

sentence.Network_en: He tried to erase the idea from his mind.
sentence.Network_cn: 他试图从头脑中抹掉这个想法.

sentence.Network_en: Make light pencil lines so that they will erase easily.
sentence.Network_cn: 划铅笔线要浅些,便于擦掉.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (originally as a heraldic term meaning 'represent the head or limb of an animal with a jagged edge'): from Latin eras- 'scraped away', from the verb eradere, from e- (variant of ex-) 'out' + radere 'scrape'

entry.tran: 忘却,抹去,消除(想法或感受)
entry.def: If you erase a thought or feeling, you destroy it completely so that you can no longer remember something or no longer feel a particular emotion.

example.ex: They are desperate to erase the memory of that last defeat in Cardiff...
example.tran: 他们急于抹去上次在卡迪夫遭遇失败的记忆。

example.ex: Love was a word he'd erased from his vocabulary since Susan's going.
example.tran: 自从苏珊离开后，他再也不提“爱情”这个词了。

entry.tran: 抹掉（磁带录音）；删除（计算机文件）
entry.def: If you erase sound which has been recorded on a tape or information which has been stored in a computer, you completely remove or destroy it.

example.ex: He was in the studio tearfully erasing all the tapes he'd slaved over...
example.tran: 他在录音棚里流着眼泪抹掉他辛苦录制的所有磁带。

example.ex: It appears the names were accidentally erased from computer disks.
example.tran: 看起来那些名字被意外地从计算机磁盘上删除了。

entry.def: If you erase something such as writing or a mark, you remove it, usually by rubbing it with a cloth.

example.ex: It was unfortunate that she had erased the message.
example.tran: 不幸的是她已经删除了那条短信。

means.word_mean: 2. remove by or as if by rubbing or erasing;

sentences.sentence: "Please erase the formula on the blackboard--it is wrong!"

auth_sentence.content: Propped up against one wall is a dry-erase board.

auth_sentence.content: They erase all memories and evidence of their nefarious activities.

auth_sentence.content: But don't worry-researchers may find ways to erase them.
auth_sentence.res_content: But don't worry-researchers may find ways to erase them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But don't worry-researchers may find ways to erase them.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ab去掉+ras刮插+ive……的→adj.使表面磨损的;粗糙的;恼人的

means.word_mean: 擦掉, 抹去, 清除

sentences.en: He erased the wrong answer and wrote in the right one.
sentences.cn: 他擦去了错误答案, 写上了正确答案。

sentences.en: Nothing can erase the incident from his memory.
sentences.cn: 没有什么东西可以使他忘记那件事。

sentences.en: His name was erased from the list.

jushi.english: Make light pencil lines so that they will erase easily.
jushi.chinese: 铅笔划得淡一些,这样容易擦掉。

jushi.english: He erased the wrong answer and wrote in the right one.
jushi.chinese: 他擦去了错误的答案,写上了正确的答案。

jushi.english: Erase the penciled notes in the margins.
jushi.chinese: 把空白处铅笔写的注释擦掉。
